abstract.t: This memo describes the current operating procedures of the InternetEngineering Steering Group (IESG), a management function of theInternet Engineering Task Force (IETF).This memo is not intended to become an RFC, but provides informationto the Internet community, for which the internet-drafts mechanism isa convenient distribution veichleDiscussion of this memo is encouraged on the POISED mailing list<poised@lists.tislab.com>
